name: you feel normal.
description:
You find yourself stranded along a lonely abandoned road desperately seeking help.
You stumble upon an old, farm-themed amusement park.
As you delve deeper into its depths, reality fractures into hallucinations of not your own,
each one of them will make you feel different.
Can you unravel the mysteries hidden within them?

Contains:
  • 5 Episodic visions (Around 30-35 minutes of gameplay)
